comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This particular aircraft (USAF CT-43A, 73-1149, c/n 20696/347) would crash on approach to Dubrovnik, Croatia on April 3, 1996, with the loss of all aboard, including US Secretary of Commerce Ron Brown. See: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1996_Croatia_USAF_CT-43_crash
